page.title: 19CUSTOMS
page.content: { ROSE ASH GYMKANA AND REVEL-By MATTHEW I woke up at about 8:30 the gymkana started about 1:00 but I went up about 10:00. I helped set up most ofthe stalls. First of all I helped set all the stuff. I will write the sequence: {10.00 set up all the stuff {1.00 horse racing started {5.30 clay pigeon shoot {8.30 barbecue and disco I have been going to the gymkana for about 5 years now . The first one was only a get-together. This year it was a big thing, over two hundred people came. When I got there they got me working straight away. I brought cream cakes from people's cars.I took them in the main tent which was at the top of the field.The cars and pedestrians were in one field and the horses were in another field.
